column5: Just 15 minutes away from NRG Stadium! Get away from it all less than 5 minutes from downtown. Enjoy this 100-year-old Craftsman bungalow on a quiet street in the Heights with original hardwood floors, original windows, mid-century modern furniture, front porch and back deck looking out on the garden, queen bed master suite with newly renovated bathroom with Jacuzzi tub, second bedroom with a queen bed and an enclosed sun porch/media room with a queen pull-out bed.
column8: Super Bowl LI Houston Home 5 mins from Downtown!
